{{groovy}} // Generating a 12 characters password pwd = (1..12).inject("") { a, b -> a += ('a'..'z')[new Random().nextFloat() * 26 as int] }.toUpperCase() {{/groovy}} {{velocity}} #set ($user = $stringtool.capitalize($stringtool.lowerCase($request.get("createUser"))) ) #if ( $user ) #if( $xwiki.exists("${user}.WebHome") || $xwiki.exists("XWiki.${user}") || $xwiki.exists("${user}.WebPreferences") ) {{error}}Either the user already exist, or a space of the same name is already created. Please pick another name.{{/error}} #else ## Creating the User ... #set($userdoc = $xwiki.getDocument("XWiki.${user}") ) $userdoc.setTitle($user) #set($userobj = $userdoc.newObject('XWiki.XWikiUsers') ) $userobj.set('first_name',$user) $userobj.set('email',"changeMe@xwiki.com") $userobj.set('password',$pwd) $userdoc.save('Creating User with FTP app',true) ## Adding generated password in Admin.Passwords page #set ($pwdpage = $xwiki.getDocument('FTPCode.Passwords')) #set ($pwdobj = $pwdpage.newObject('Encryption.ProtectedFieldClass') ) $pwdobj.set('name',"${user}") $pwdobj.set('protectedText',$services.encryptionTool.encrypt("$pwd")) $pwdpage.save() ##Adding in XWikiAllGroup #set( $allgroup = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiAllGroup') ) #set( $allgroupobj = $allgroup.newObject('XWiki.XWikiGroups') ) $allgroupobj.set('member',"XWiki.${user}") $allgroup.save() ## Creating the Space #if ( ! $xwiki.copyDocument('FTPCode.Template',"${user}.WebHome") ) {{error}}Space creation failed{{/error}} #else #set ($webhome = $xwiki.getDocument("${user}.WebHome") ) $webhome.save() #end ## Setting the Rights #set ( $webprefs = $xwiki.getDocument("${user}.WebPreferences") ) #set ( $webrights = $webprefs.getObject('XWiki.XWikiGlobalRights',true) ) $webrights.set("levels","view,comment,edit") $webrights.set("users","${user}") $webrights.set("allow",1) $webprefs.save('Setting WebPrefs',true) {{info}}The user $user has been created successfully, with password $pwd{{/info}} #end #else {{html}}
New FTP User:
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
